ref: 13779 sthōra m. ʻ beast of burden ʼ BHS ii 611, sthōrin -- , sthaurin -- m. ʻ pack -- horse ʼ lex. [← Ir., cf. NW. Turfan Pahl. ʻ stwr ʻ horse ʼ G. Morgenstierne BSOS viii 659]
